document.full_text: georgian riot police broke up five days of demonstrations demanding the resignation of president mikheil saakashvili on thursday and two people were killed by cars speeding from the clashes.
document.title: georgian riot police crush protest, two killed
lines_and_colors: georgian riot police broke up five days of demonstrations demanding the resignation of president mikheil saakashvili on thursday and two people were killed by cars speeding from the clashes.
